{{also|合众国}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|合|衆|国}}

===Etymology===
From {{ja-r|合衆|がっしゅう|gloss=assembly of people}} and {{ja-r|国|こく}}, originally meaning [[republic]]. Because of association with the United States of America, this word now means United States.

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|がっしゅうこく}}

# [[United States]]
# (''country'') [[United States of America]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|米国|^べいこく}}
* {{ja-r|アメリカ|^アメリカ}}: America
* {{ja-r|アメリカ合衆国|^アメリカ ^がっしゅうこく}}: United States of America

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|メキシコ合衆国|^メキシコ ^がっしゅうこく}}: [[United Mexican States]]
